nodes.text: The Gods of Age were a group of seventeen deities that were worshipped by the Fia, a sentient species native to the planet Galantos. Each deity represented a different stage in the Fia lifecyle and each Fian worshipped the deity that corresponded with their particular age group. The god Hus'yoyu represented Fia from birth to the age of six, while the god Gotagei was assigned to Fia that reached the age of forty, and the god Erio'anum was prayed to by the Fia from the age of ninety-seven until death.
